definitions.definition: Agent noun of bed ; one who beds.

( Cambridge University slang ) Contraction of bedmaker ; a housekeeper or domestic cleaner (historically a domestic servant ), generally female, employed by one of the constituent colleges of Cambridge University to clean rooms; generally equivalent to a modern scout at Oxford University .

main_definition: Agent noun of bed ; one who beds.
secondary_definitions: ( Cambridge University slang ) Contraction of bedmaker ; a housekeeper or domestic cleaner (historically a domestic servant ), generally female, employed by one of the constituent colleges of Cambridge University to clean rooms; generally equivalent to a modern scout at Oxford University .

definitions.definition: A property with a specified number of bedrooms .

main_definition: ( in combination , informal ) A property with a specified number of bedrooms .
